ability.fail.not_found: No ability found with that combination
ability.fail.not_skilled_enough: You cannot unlock a %1$s level technique
naruto_universe:chakra_control.name: Chakra Control
naruto_universe:chakra_control.desc: Allows you to walk on water and climb walls.
naruto_universe:power_charge.name: Power Charge
naruto_universe:power_charge.desc: Charges your next ability. Hold [SHIFT] to charge gradually.
naruto_universe:chakra_jump.name: Chakra Jump
naruto_universe:great_fireball.name: Great Fireball Technique
naruto_universe:great_fireball.desc: Shoots a large fireball at your opponent.
naruto_universe:phoenix_sage_fire.name: Phoenix Sage Fire Technique
naruto_universe:phoenix_sage_fire.desc: Shoots multiple fireballs at your opponent.
naruto_universe:hiding_in_ash.name: Hiding in Ash Technique
naruto_universe:hiding_in_ash.desc: User expels chakra-infused ash from their mouth that burns anyone who comes in contact with it.
naruto_universe:great_flame.name: Great Flame Technique
naruto_universe:great_flame.desc: User expels a large stream of flames from their mouth that progressively widens with range.
naruto_universe:great_annihilation.name: Great Annihilation Technique
naruto_universe:great_annihilation.desc: User expels a large "sea of flames" from their mouth which covers a wide area.
naruto_universe:sharingan.name: Activate Sharingan
naruto_universe:rinnegan.name: Activate Rinnegan
give.clan: You have been born in the %1$s clan
sharingan.unlock.one: You feel grief and you feel something happening to your eyes as you awaken the sharingan
sharingan.unlock.two: You feel a sudden surge of power as your sharingan unlocks it's second tomoe
sharingan.unlock.three: You feel a sudden surge of power as your sharingan unlocks it's third tomoe
ability.fail.not_enough_power: You need to charge more power
